description: Our team has been having fun exploring the capabilities of ChatGPT and recently had the bot create our very own Justia rap song. Check it out on our Facebook page!

image.alt: Take Me Out to the Ball Game

columns.blockSubtitle: Take Me Out to the Ball Game
description: Zoey is looking forward to the upcoming baseball season! She roots for the San Francisco Giants, even if she snoozes through most of the games.
